data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schaefer, Hanno, Nee, Michael H. (2012): Melothria domingensis (Cucurbitaceae), an endangered Caribbean endemic, is a Cayaponia. PhytoKeys 18: 45-60, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.18.3914, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.18.3914
